title: Garlic Butter Steak
description: Juicy pan-seared steak with garlic butter.
steps: Season steaks generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a pan over high heat.
Add butter and garlic, baste steaks.

title: Spicy Tofu Stir Fry
description: A quick and tasty spicy tofu stir fry.
steps: Cube the tofu and fry until golden.
Add soy sauce and chili pepper.

title: One-pan Lemon Garlic Chicken and Potatoes
ingredients: Zest of 1 lemon, plus the juice of 2 lemons (you need ¼ cup/60 ml of lemon juice)
½ tsp freshly cracked black pepper
6 medium all-purpose potatoes, cut into wedges
1 tbsp fresh oregano or parsley, to garnish
Steamed greens or green salad, to serve
steps: In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, oregano, garlic, lemon zest and juice, sweet paprika, dijon mustard, sugar, salt and pepper. Add the chicken and toss to coat. Marinate for up to 24 hours or cook immediately.

Arrange the potatoes in an even layer in a large baking pan and top with the chicken. Scrape out any marinade left in the bowl and coat the potatoes with it, using your hands. Ensure the chicken cutlets are not overlapping
Add the chicken stock to the base of the pan.
Scatter the lemon slices around the pan on top of the potatoes only (avoid placing the lemon slices on the chicken as it stops the skin from browning).
Bake for 55–60 minutes or until the chicken is golden and cooked through, shuffling the potatoes to stop them burning and adding the olives at around the 30-minute mark.
Sprinkle the chicken with fresh oregano or parsley and serve with your side of choice.
